QuestData.Title: The Baron's Plan
QuestData.Description:
You have done well in my service, Nelesis. When the time has come to take my rightful place, you will be well rewarded.
Until then, I will require your utmost devotion and secrecy.
Our preparations are almost complete. Come, walk with me, and I will show you the splendor of our works.
QuestData.RewardText:
There are but a few tasks remaining before we can complete our ritual.
You must begin immediately.
